### <a name="method-adddatecontrol"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-9797">メソッド addDateControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9797">Method addDateControl</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-9798">レポート セクションにデータ コントロールを追加します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9798">Adds a date control to a report section.</span></span>

    public ReportDateControl addDateControl(TableId tableId, FieldId fieldId)

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-9799">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9799">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-9800">tableId</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9800">tableId</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="09e61-9801">フィールド ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9801">The field ID.</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-9802">fieldId</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9802">fieldId</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="09e61-9803">フィールド ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9803">The field ID.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-9804">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9804">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-9805">日付コントロールが作成されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9805">The date control that is created.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-9806">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9806">Examples</span></span>

    static void test(args a) 
    { 
        reportRun rr; 
        inventTrans rec; 
        int i; 
        // Create a simple report that is not present in 
        // the Application Object Tree. 
        report r = new report(); 
        reportDesign rd = r.addDesign("myDesign"); 
        reportSection rs = rd.AddSection(reportBlockType::body,  
        tablenum(inventTrans)); 
        int t = tablenum(inventTrans); 
        int f; 
        f = fieldnum(inventTrans, datePhysical); 
        rs.addDateControl(t,f); 
        // run the report 
        rr = new reportRun(r); 
        // Run the sysPrintForm form. 
        if (rr.prompt())  
        { 
            while select rec 
                rr.send(rec); 
            // Print report to the target (e.g. printer or screen) selected during the  
            // prompt call above. 
            rr.print();  
        } 
    }

### <a name="method-autodeclaration"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-9945">メソッド autoDeclaration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9945">Method autoDeclaration</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-9946">システムがコントロールと同じ名前を持つメンバー変数を宣言できるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9946">Determines whether the system can declare a member variable that has the same name as the control.</span></span>

    public boolean autoDeclaration([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-9947">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9947">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-9950">このコントロールのためにメンバー変数を宣言することができる場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9950">true if the member variable can be declared for this control; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-9951">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9951">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-9958">コントロール内のテキストを出力するのに使用されるフォントの重量を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9958">Gets or sets the weight of font that is used to output text in the control.</span></span>

    public int bold([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-9959">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9959">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-9960">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9960">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-9961">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9961">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-9962">0 から 9 までの間の整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9962">An integer value between zero and nine, inclusive.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-9963">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9963">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-9964">返される整数には、次のようなフォントの重量が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9964">The integer that is returned contains the weight of the font as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-9965">0 既定のフォントの重量を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9965">0 Use the default font weight.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-9966">1 シン。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9966">1 Thin.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-9967">2 エクストラ ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9967">2 Extra-light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-9968">3. ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9968">3 Light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-9969">4 標準。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9969">4 Normal.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-9970">5 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9970">5 Medium.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-9971">6 セミボールド。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9971">6 Semibold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-9972">7 太字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9972">7 Bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-9973">8 極太。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9973">8 Extra-bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-9974">9 ヘビー。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-9974">9 Heavy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10014">フォントの文字セット示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10014">An integer value that indicates the character set of the font.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10015">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10015">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10016">返される整数の値は、次のテーブルに従って文字セットを示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10016">The values for the integer that is returned indicate the character set according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10017">値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10017">Value.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10018">説明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10018">Description.</span></span>         |
|--------|----------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10019">0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10019">0</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10020">ANSI\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10020">ANSI\_CHARSET</span></span>        |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10021">1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10021">1</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10022">DEFAULT\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10022">DEFAULT\_CHARSET</span></span>     |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10023">2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10023">2</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10024">SYMBOL\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10024">SYMBOL\_CHARSET</span></span>      |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10025">77</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10025">77</span></span>     | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10026">MAC\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10026">MAC\_CHARSET</span></span>         |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10027">128</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10027">128</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10028">SHIFTJIS\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10028">SHIFTJIS\_CHARSET</span></span>    |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10029">129</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10029">129</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10030">HANGUL\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10030">HANGUL\_CHARSET</span></span>      |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10031">134</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10031">134</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10032">GB2312\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10032">GB2312\_CHARSET</span></span>      |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10033">136</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10033">136</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10034">CHINESEBIG5\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10034">CHINESEBIG5\_CHARSET</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10035">161</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10035">161</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10036">GREEK\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10036">GREEK\_CHARSET</span></span>       |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10037">162</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10037">162</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10038">TURKISH\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10038">TURKISH\_CHARSET</span></span>     |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10039">163</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10039">163</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10040">VIETNAMESE\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10040">VIETNAMESE\_CHARSET</span></span>  |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10041">186</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10041">186</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10042">BALTIC\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10042">BALTIC\_CHARSET</span></span>      |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10043">204</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10043">204</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10044">RUSSIAN\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10044">RUSSIAN\_CHARSET</span></span>     |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10045">238</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10045">238</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10046">EASTEUROPE\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10046">EASTEUROPE\_CHARSET</span></span>  |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10047">255</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10047">255</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10048">OEM\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10048">OEM\_CHARSET</span></span>         |

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10049">次のテーブルの値は、韓国語版 Microsoft Windows の値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10049">The value in the following table is for the Korean language edition of Microsoft Windows:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10050">値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10050">Value.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10051">説明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10051">Description.</span></span>   |
|--------|----------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10052">130</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10052">130</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10053">JOHAB\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10053">JOHAB\_CHARSET</span></span> |

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10054">次のテーブルの値は、中東言語語版 Windows の値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10054">The values in the following table are for the Middle East language edition of Windows:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10055">値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10055">Value.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10056">説明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10056">Description.</span></span>    |
|--------|-----------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10057">177</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10057">177</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10058">HEBREW\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10058">HEBREW\_CHARSET</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10059">178</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10059">178</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10060">ARABIC\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10060">ARABIC\_CHARSET</span></span> |

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10061">次のテーブルの値は、タイ語版 Windows の値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10061">The value in the following table is for the Thai language edition of Windows:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10062">値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10062">Value.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10063">説明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10063">Description.</span></span>  |
|--------|---------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10064">222</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10064">222</span></span>    | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10065">THAI\_CHARSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10065">THAI\_CHARSET</span></span> |

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10066">既定の文字セットは、現在のシステム ロケールに基づく値に対して設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10066">The default character set is set to a value that is based on the current system locale.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10067">たとえば、システム ロケールが英語 (米国) である場合、ANSI\_CHARSET として設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10067">For example, when the system locale is English (United States), it is set as ANSI\_CHARSET.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10068">詳細については、MSDN Web サイト、http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=85972 で LOGFONT 構造を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10068">For more information, see the LOGFONT structure on the MSDN Web site, http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=85972.</span></span>

### <a name="method-colorscheme"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10069">メソッド colorScheme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10069">Method colorScheme</span></span>

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10071">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10071">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10074">ゼロから 2 までの整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10074">An integer between zero and two, inclusive.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10075">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10075">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10076">配色は次の表に従って定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10076">The color scheme is defined according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10077">値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10077">Value.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10078">スタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10078">Style.</span></span>                 |

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10166">使用するコントロールのテキストの色を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10166">Gets or sets the text color for the control to use.</span></span>

    public int foregroundColor([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10167">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10167">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10168">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10168">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10169">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10169">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10170">パックされた RGB カラーを含む整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10170">An integer that contains a packed RGB color.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10171">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10171">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10172">返される整数には、次のようにパックされた RGB カラーが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10172">The integer that is returned contains a packed RGB color as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10173">下位バイトには赤の相対強度の値が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10173">The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10174">2 番目のバイトには緑の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10174">The second byte contains a value for green.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10175">3 番目のバイトには青の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10175">The third byte contains a value for blue.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10176">上位バイトはゼロでなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10176">The high-order byte must be zero.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10177">1 バイトの最大値は 255 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10177">The maximum value for a single byte is 255.</span></span>

### <a name="method-height100mm"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10211">メソッド height100mm</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10211">Method height100mm</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10212">枠線および上下の余白の高さを除く、セクションの高さを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10212">Gets or sets the height of a section, excluding the height of the border and the top and bottom margins.</span></span>

    public int height100mm([int height])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10213">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10213">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10214">height</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10214">height</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10215">1/100 mm の新しい値 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10215">The new value in 1/100 mm; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10216">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10216">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10217">1/100 mm 単位の高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10217">The height in 1/100 mm.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10218">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10218">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10219">このメソッドは、heightExclBorderAndMargins メソッドとして機能します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10219">This method acts as a heightExclBorderAndMargins method.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10220">返される高さは、height プロパティの値に対応します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10220">The height that is returned corresponds to the value of the height property.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10221">この関数を使用して height プロパティを設定する前に、height プロパティが AUTO に設定されていないことを確認してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10221">Before you use this function to set the height property, make sure that the height property is not set to AUTO.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10222">それ以外の場合、組み込みロジックは、値を再計算する可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10222">Otherwise, built-in logic might recalculate the value.</span></span>

### <a name="method-heightmm100"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10223">メソッド heightmm100</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10223">Method heightmm100</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10224">枠線および上下の余白の高さを含む、セクションの高さを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10224">Gets or sets the height of a section, including the height of the border and the top and bottom margins.</span></span>

    public int heightmm100([int heightInclMargins])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10225">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10225">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10226">heightInclMargins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10226">heightInclMargins</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10227">セクションの新しい合計高さ (1/100 mm) (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10227">The new total height of the section in 1/100 mm; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10228">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10228">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10229">1/100 mm 単位の高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10229">The height in 1/100 mm.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10230">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10230">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10231">このメソッドは、heightInclBorderAndMargins メソッドとして機能します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10231">This method acts as a heightInclBorderAndMargins method.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10232">この関数を使用して height プロパティを設定する前に、height プロパティが AUTO に設定されていないことを確認してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10232">Before you use this function to set the height property, make sure that the height property is not set to AUTO.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10233">それ以外の場合、組み込みロジックは、高さを設定する可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10233">Otherwise, the built-in logic might set the height.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10234">Heightmm100 メソッドに 1000 が返される場合は、セクションの合計の高さは 10 mm になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10234">If the heightmm100 method returns 1000, the total height of the section is 10 mm.</span></span>

### <a name="method-heightmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10235">メソッド heightMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10235">Method heightMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10236">コントロールの高さの計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10236">Gets or sets a calculation mode for the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int heightMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10237">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10237">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10238">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10238">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10239">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10239">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10240">計算モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10240">The calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10241">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10241">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10242">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10242">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10243">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10243">Mode.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10244">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10244">Height Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|----------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10245">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10245">Exact.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10246">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10246">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10247">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10247">Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10248">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10248">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10249">列の高さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10249">Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10250">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10250">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10251">計算モードが [自動] または [列の高さ] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの高さが変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10251">The height of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column height.</span></span>

### <a name="method-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10348">メソッド名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10348">Method name</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10349">フォーム、レポート、テーブル、クエリ、または別の Finance and Operations アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためのコードで使用される名前を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10349">Gets or sets the name that is used in code to identify a form, report, table, query, or another Finance and Operations application object.</span></span>

    public str name([str value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10350">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10350">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10351">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10351">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10352">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10352">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10353">アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためにコードで使用される名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10353">The name that is used in code to identify an application object.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10354">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10354">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10355">オブジェクトの名前プロパティ値は、コードの競合を避けるために、次の基準を満たしている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10355">The name property value of an object must meet the following criteria to avoid code conflicts:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10356">文字で始めます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10356">Begins with a letter.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10357">250 文字を超えないでください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10357">Doesn't exceed 250 characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10358">数字とアンダースコア文字を含めることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10358">Can include numbers and underscore characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10359">句読点やスペースを含めることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10359">Cannot include punctuation or spaces.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10360">テーブルは、拡張データ型、基本列挙型、クラスなどの他のパブリック オブジェクトと同じ名前を持つことはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10360">Tables cannot have the same name as other public objects, such as extended data types, base enums, classes, and so on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10424">フィールド ID (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10424">The field ID; optional.</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10425">fieldId</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10425">fieldId</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10426">フィールド ID (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10426">The field ID; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10427">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10427">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10428">指定したセクション グループ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10428">The specified section group.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10429">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10429">Examples</span></span>

    static void test(args a) 
    {  
        reportRun rr;  
        inventTrans rec;  
        int i;  
        int t = tablenum(inventTrans);  
        int f = fieldnum(inventTrans, datePhysical);  
        // Create a simple report that is not present in  
        // the Application Object Tree. 
        report r = new report();  
        reportDesign rd = r.addDesign("myDesign");  
        reportSectionGroup rsg;  
        reportSection rs = rd.AddSection(reportBlockType::body, t);  
        rs.addControl(t,f);  
        rsg = rd.SectionGroup(t);  
        if (rsg) 
        { 
            rs = rsg.AddSection(ReportBlockType::Header);  
            // Run the report. 
            rs.AddTextControl("This is the groupHeader"); 
        } 
        rr = new reportRun(r);  
        // Run the sysPrintForm form. 
        if (rr.prompt())  
        {  
            select rec;  
            rr.send(rec);  
            // Print report to the target, such as printer or screen. 
            rr.print();  
        } 
    }

### <a name="method-executesection"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10514">メソッド executeSection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10514">Method executeSection</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10515">レポートにセクションを印刷します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10515">Prints the section on the report.</span></span>

    public void executeSection()

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10516">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10516">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10517">このメソッドは、セクションがトリガーされたときに呼び出されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10517">This method is called when the section is triggered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10518">たとえば、ReportRun::send メソッドが実行されるときに、本文セクションがトリガーされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10518">For example, a body section is triggered when ReportRun::send method is executed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10519">実際にレポート内のセクションを印刷する executeSection メソッドでの super メソッドの呼び出しです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10519">It is the super method call in the executeSection method that actually prints the section in the report.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10520">Finance and Operations のアプリケーション オブジェクト ツリー (AOT) では、各セクションのメソッドのノードの下に executeSection メソッドがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10520">In the Finance and Operations Application Object Tree (AOT), you will find the executeSection method below each section's methods node.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10521">次のページに移動するなど、セクションが印刷される前に何らかのアクションを実行する場合は、executeSection メソッドでこのアクションをコード化できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10521">If you want to perform some action before a section is printed, such as go to the next page, this action can be coded in the executeSection method.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10547">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10547">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10548">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10548">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10549">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10549">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10550">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10550">Mode.</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10551">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10551">Height calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10552">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10552">-1 Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10553">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10553">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10554">0 自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10554">0 Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10555">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10555">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10556">1 列の高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10556">1 Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10557">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10557">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10558">高さと高さ計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10558">The height and height calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

## <a name="class-reportsectiongroup"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10559">クラス ReportSectionGroup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10559">Class ReportSectionGroup</span></span>
    class ReportSectionGroup extends TreeNode

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10560">ReportSectionGroup クラスは、レポート セクションのコレクションを定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10560">The ReportSectionGroup class defines a collection of report sections.</span></span>

### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10561">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10561">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10562">レポート セクション グループは、ヘッダー セクション、本文セクション、フッター セクションを含めることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10562">A report section group can contain header sections, body sections, and footer sections.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10563">このクラスでは、作成、読み取り、更新、および X++ コードとメタデータを削除できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10563">This class lets you create, read, update, and delete X++ code and metadata.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10564">この API を呼び出す前に、開発セキュリティ キー (SysDevelopment) にアクセスする必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10564">You must have access to the development security key (SysDevelopment) before you call this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10588">フォーム、レポート、テーブル、クエリ、または別の MSDAX アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためのコードで使用される名前を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10588">Gets or sets the name that is used in code to identify a form, report, table, query, or another MSDAX application object.</span></span>

    public str name([str value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10589">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10589">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10592">アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためにコードで使用される名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10592">The name that is used in code to identify an application object.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10593">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10593">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10594">オブジェクトの名前プロパティ値は、コードの競合を避けるために、次の基準を満たしている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10594">The name property value of an object must meet the following criteria to avoid code conflicts:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10595">文字で始めます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10595">Begins with a letter.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10596">250 文字を超えないでください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10596">Doesn't exceed 250 characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10597">数字とアンダースコア文字を含めることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10597">Can include numbers and underscore characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10598">句読点やスペースを含めることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10598">Cannot include punctuation or spaces.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10599">テーブルは、拡張データ型、基本列挙型、クラスなどの他のパブリック オブジェクトと同じ名前を持つことはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10599">Tables cannot have the same name as other public objects, such as extended data types, base enums, classes, and so on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10784">ゼロから 2 までの整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10784">An integer between zero and two, inclusive.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10785">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10785">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10786">配色は次の表に従って定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10786">The color scheme is defined according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10787">値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10787">Value.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10788">スタイル。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10788">Style.</span></span>                         |
|--------|--------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10789">0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10789">0</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10790">既定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10790">Default.</span></span>                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10791">1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10791">1</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10792">Microsoft Windows パレット。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10792">The Microsoft Windows palette.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10793">2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10793">2</span></span>      | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10794">真の配色。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10794">The true-color scheme.</span></span>         |

### <a name="method-foregroundcolor"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10838">メソッド foregroundColor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10838">Method foregroundColor</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10839">使用するコントロールのテキストの色を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10839">Gets or sets the text color for the control to use.</span></span>

    public int foregroundColor([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10840">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10840">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10841">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10841">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10842">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10842">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10843">パックされた RGB カラーを含む整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10843">An integer that contains a packed RGB color.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10844">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10844">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10845">返される整数には、次のようにパックされた RGB カラーが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10845">The integer that is returned contains a packed RGB color as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10846">下位バイトには赤の相対強度の値が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10846">The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10847">2 番目のバイトには緑の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10847">The second byte contains a value for green.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10848">3 番目のバイトには青の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10848">The third byte contains a value for blue.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10849">上位バイトはゼロでなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10849">The high-order byte must be zero.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10850">1 バイトの最大値は 255 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10850">The maximum value for a single byte is 255.</span></span>

### <a name="method-height100mm"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10851">メソッド height100mm</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10851">Method height100mm</span></span>

    public int height100mm([int heightExclBorder])

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10860">コントロールの高さの計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10860">Gets or sets a calculation mode for the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int heightMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10861">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10861">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10862">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10862">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10863">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10863">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10864">計算モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10864">The calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-10865">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10865">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10866">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10866">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10867">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10867">Mode.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10868">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10868">Height Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|----------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10869">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10869">Exact.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10870">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10870">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10871">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10871">Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10872">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10872">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10873">列の高さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10873">Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-10874">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10874">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-10875">計算モードが [自動] または [列の高さ] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの高さが変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-10875">The height of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column height.</span></span>

### <a name="method-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11045">メソッド名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11045">Method name</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11046">フォーム、レポート、テーブル、クエリ、または別の MSDAX アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためのコードで使用される名前を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11046">Gets or sets the name used in code to identify a form, report, table, query, or another MSDAX application object.</span></span>

    public str name([str value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11047">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11047">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11048">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11048">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11049">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11049">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11050">アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためにコードで使用される名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11050">The name used in code to identify an application object.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11051">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11051">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11052">オブジェクトの名前プロパティ値は、コードの競合を避けるために、次の基準を満たしている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11052">The name property value of an object must meet the following criteria to avoid code conflicts:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11053">文字で始めます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11053">Begins with a letter.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11054">250 文字を超えないでください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11054">Doesn't exceed 250 characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11055">数字とアンダースコア文字を含めることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11055">Can include numbers and underscore characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11056">句読点やスペースを含めることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11056">Cannot include punctuation or spaces.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11057">テーブルは、拡張データ型、基本列挙型、クラスなどの他のパブリック オブジェクトと同じ名前を持つことはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11057">Tables cannot have the same name as other public objects, such as extended data types, base enums, classes, and so on.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11183">メソッド widthMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11183">Method widthMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11184">コントロールの幅の計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11184">Gets or sets the calculation mode of the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int widthMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11185">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11185">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11186">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11186">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11187">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11187">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11188">現在の計算モードを示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11188">An integer value that indicates the current calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11189">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11189">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11190">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11190">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11191">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11191">Mode.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11192">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11192">Width Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|---------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11193">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11193">Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11194">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11194">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11195">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11195">Auto.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11196">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11196">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11197">列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11197">Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11198">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11198">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11199">モードが [自動] または [列の幅] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの幅が変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11199">The width of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column width.</span></span>

### <a name="method-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11236">メソッド height</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11236">Method height</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11237">コントロールの高さを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11237">Gets or sets the height of the control.</span></span>

    public void height(Real value, Units unit)

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11238">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11238">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11239">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11239">value</span></span>  

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11240">単位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11240">unit</span></span>  

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11241">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11241">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11242">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11242">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11243">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11243">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11244">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11244">Mode.</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11245">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11245">Height calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11246">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11246">-1 Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11247">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11247">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11248">0 自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11248">0 Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11249">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11249">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11250">1 列の高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11250">1 Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11251">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11251">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11252">高さと高さ計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11252">The height and height calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

|-----------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11277">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11277">-1 Exact.</span></span>       | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11278">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11278">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11281">1 列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11281">1 Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11282">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11282">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11283">幅と幅計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11283">The width and width calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

## <a name="class-reportstringcontrol"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11284">クラス ReportStringControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11284">Class ReportStringControl</span></span>
    class ReportStringControl extends ReportControl

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11285">ReportStringControl クラスを使用すると、X++ コードとメタデータの作成、読み取り、更新、および削除を行うことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11285">The ReportStringControl class lets you create, read, update, and delete X++ code and metadata.</span></span>

### <a name="method-autodeclaration"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11454">メソッド autoDeclaration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11454">Method autoDeclaration</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11455">システムがコントロールと同じ名前を持つメンバー変数を宣言できるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11455">Determines whether the system can declare a member variable that has the same name as the control.</span></span>

    public boolean autoDeclaration([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11456">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11456">Parameters</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11458">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11458">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11459">このコントロールのためにメンバー変数を宣言することができる場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11459">true if the member variable can be declared for this control; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11460">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11460">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11461">コントロールには同じ名前を付けることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11461">Controls cannot have identical names.</span></span>

### <a name="method-backgroundcolor"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11462">メソッド backgroundColor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11462">Method backgroundColor</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11463">コントロールの背景色を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11463">Gets or sets the background color of the control.</span></span>

    public int backgroundColor([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11464">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11464">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11465">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11465">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11466">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11466">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11467">パックされた RGB カラーを含む整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11467">An integer that contains a packed RGB color.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11468">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11468">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11469">返される整数には、次のようにパックされた RGB カラーが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11469">The integer that is returned contains a packed RGB color as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11470">下位バイトには赤の相対強度の値が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11470">The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11471">2 番目のバイトには緑の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11471">The second byte contains a value for green.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11472">3 番目のバイトには青の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11472">The third byte contains a value for blue.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11473">上位バイトはゼロでなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11473">The high-order byte must be zero.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11474">1 バイトの最大値は 255 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11474">The maximum value for a single byte is 255.</span></span>

### <a name="method-backstyle"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11475">メソッド backStyle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11475">Method backStyle</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11476">コントロールの背景色を透明にできるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11476">Determines whether the control background can be transparent.</span></span>

    public int backStyle([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11477">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11477">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11478">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11478">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11479">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11479">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11480">コントロールの背景が透明の場合は 1、それ以外の場合は、0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11480">1 if the control background can be transparent; otherwise, 0.</span></span>

### <a name="method-bold"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11481">メソッド bold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11481">Method bold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11482">コントロール内のテキストを出力するのに使用されるフォントの重量を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11482">Gets or sets the weight of font that is used to output text in the control.</span></span>

    public int bold([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11483">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11483">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11484">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11484">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11485">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11485">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11486">0 から 9 までの間の整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11486">An integer value between zero and nine, inclusive.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11487">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11487">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11488">返される整数には、次のようなフォントの重量が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11488">The integer that is returned contains the weight of the font as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11489">0 既定のフォントの重量を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11489">0 Use the default font weight.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11490">1 シン。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11490">1 Thin.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11491">2 エクストラ ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11491">2 Extra-light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11492">3. ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11492">3 Light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11493">4 標準。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11493">4 Normal.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11494">5 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11494">5 Medium.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11495">6 セミボールド。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11495">6 Semibold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11496">7 太字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11496">7 Bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11497">8 極太。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11497">8 Extra-bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11498">9 ヘビー。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11498">9 Heavy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11675">使用するコントロールのテキストの色を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11675">Gets or sets the text color for the control to use.</span></span>

    public int foregroundColor([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11676">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11676">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11677">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11677">value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11679">パックされた RGB カラーを含む整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11679">An integer that contains a packed RGB color.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11680">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11680">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11681">返される整数には、次のようにパックされた RGB カラーが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11681">The integer that is returned contains a packed RGB color as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11682">下位バイトには赤の相対強度の値が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11682">The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11683">2 番目のバイトには緑の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11683">The second byte contains a value for green.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11684">3 番目のバイトには青の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11684">The third byte contains a value for blue.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11685">上位バイトはゼロでなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11685">The high-order byte must be zero.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11686">1 バイトの最大値は 255 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11686">The maximum value for a single byte is 255.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11696">コントロールの高さの計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11696">Gets or sets a calculation mode for the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int heightMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11697">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11697">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11698">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11698">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11699">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11699">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11700">計算モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11700">The calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11701">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11701">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11702">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11702">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11703">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11703">Mode.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11704">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11704">Height Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|----------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11705">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11705">Exact.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11706">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11706">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11707">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11707">Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11708">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11708">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11709">列の高さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11709">Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11710">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11710">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11711">計算モードが [自動] または [列の高さ] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの高さが変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11711">The height of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column height.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11882">フォーム、レポート、テーブル、クエリ、または別の Finance and Operations アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためのコードで使用される名前を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11882">Gets or sets the name that is used in code to identify a form, report, table, query, or another Finance and Operations application object.</span></span>

    public str name([str value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11883">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11883">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11884">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11884">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11885">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11885">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11886">アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためにコードで使用される名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11886">The name that is used in code to identify an application object.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-11887">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11887">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-11888">オブジェクトの名前プロパティ値は、コードの競合を避けるために、次の基準を満たしている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11888">The name property value of an object must meet the following criteria to avoid code conflicts:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11889">文字で始めます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11889">Begins with a letter.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11890">250 文字を超えないでください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11890">Doesn't exceed 250 characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11891">数字とアンダースコア文字を含めることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11891">Can include numbers and underscore characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11892">句読点やスペースを含めることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11892">Cannot include punctuation or spaces.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="09e61-11893">テーブルは、拡張データ型、基本列挙型、クラスなどの他のパブリック オブジェクトと同じ名前を持つことはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-11893">Tables cannot have the same name as other public objects, such as extended data types, base enums, classes, and so on.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-12025">メソッド widthMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12025">Method widthMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12026">コントロールの幅の計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12026">Gets or sets the calculation mode of the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int widthMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-12027">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12027">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12028">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12028">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-12029">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12029">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12030">現在の計算モードを示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12030">An integer value that indicates the current calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-12031">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12031">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12032">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12032">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12033">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12033">Mode.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12034">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12034">Width Calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|---------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12035">正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12035">Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12036">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12036">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12037">自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12037">Auto.</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12038">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12038">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12039">列の幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12039">Column width.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12040">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12040">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12041">モードが [自動] または [列の幅] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの幅が変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12041">The width of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column width.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-12060">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12060">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12061">コントロールの幅を変更するには、正確な幅の計算モードを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12061">To change the width of the control, use the exact width calculation mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12063">コントロールの高さを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12063">Gets or sets the height of the control.</span></span>

    public void height(Real value, Units unit)

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-12064">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12064">Parameters</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-12067">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12067">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12068">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12068">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12069">次の表に従って高さを計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12069">Calculate the height according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12070">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12070">Mode.</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12071">高さの計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12071">Height calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12072">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12072">-1 Exact.</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12073">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12073">The exact height in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12074">0 自動。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12074">0 Auto.</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12075">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12075">The height of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12076">1 列の高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12076">1 Column height.</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12077">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12077">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12078">高さと高さ計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12078">The height and height calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12098">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12098">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

    public void width(Real value, Units unit)

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-12099">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12099">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12100">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12100">value</span></span>  

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12101">単位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12101">unit</span></span>  

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-12102">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12102">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12103">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12103">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12104">次の表に従って幅を計算します:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12104">Calculate the width according to the following table:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12105">モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12105">Mode.</span></span>           | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12106">幅計算。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12106">Width calculation.</span></span>                                                                       |
|-----------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12107">-1 正確。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12107">-1 Exact.</span></span>       | <span data-ttu-id="09e61-12108">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12108">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |

### <a name="method-autodeclaration"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-12320">メソッド autoDeclaration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12320">Method autoDeclaration</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12321">システムがコントロールと同じ名前を持つメンバー変数を宣言できるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12321">Determines whether the system can declare a member variable that has the same name as the control.</span></span>

    public boolean autoDeclaration([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-12322">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12322">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12325">このコントロールのためにメンバー変数を宣言することができる場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12325">true if the member variable can be declared for this control; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09e61-12326">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12326">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09e61-12327">コントロールには同じ名前を付けることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09e61-12327">Controls cannot have identical names.</span></span>
